movie.title: Blade Runner 2049
movie.plot: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.
movie.actors: Ryan Gosling, Ana de Armas, Harrison Ford, Dave Bautista

movie.title: Predators
movie.plot: A group of elite warriors parachute into an unfamiliar jungle and are hunted by members of a merciless alien race.
movie.actors: Adrien Brody, Laurence Fishburne, Danny Trejo

movie.title: TRON: Legacy
movie.plot: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.
movie.actors: Jeff Bridges, Garrett Hedlund, Olivia Wilde

movie.title: Oxygen
movie.plot: A woman wakes in a cryogenic chamber with no recollection of how she got there. As she's running out of oxygen, she must rebuild her memory to find a way out of her nightmare.
movie.actors: Mélanie Laurent

movie.title: Thor: Ragnarok
movie.plot: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.
movie.actors: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett

movie.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movie.plot: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.
movie.actors: Tom Hardy, Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult

movie.title: Godzilla
movie.plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.
movie.actors: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Elizabeth Olsen, Bryan Cranston

movie.title: Love, Death & Robots: Vol.2
movie.plot: A collection of animated short stories that span various genres including science fiction, fantasy, horror and comedy.
movie.actors: Peter Franzén

movie.title: Blood Machines
movie.plot: An artificial intelligence escapes her spaceship to turn into a female ghost and challenges two blade runners to a galactic chase.
movie.actors: Elisa Lasowski, Anders Heinrichsen, Christian Erickson

movie.title: Avatar
movie.plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
movie.actors: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver

movie.title: The Intouchables
movie.plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.
movie.actors: François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Audrey Fleurot

movie.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
movie.plot: When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he could have ever imagined.
movie.actors: Ben Stiller, Kristen Wiig, Sean Penn

movie.title: Life
movie.plot: A team of scientists aboard the International Space Station discover a rapidly evolving life form that caused extinction on Mars and now threatens all life on Earth.
movie.actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds

movie.title: Prometheus
movie.plot: Following clues to the origin of mankind, a team finds a structure on a distant moon, but they soon realize they are not alone.
movie.actors: Noomi Rapace, Logan Marshall-Green, Michael Fassbender

movie.title: Edge of Tomorrow
movie.plot: A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.
movie.actors: Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt,

movie.title: The Martian
movie.plot: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.
movie.actors: Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig

movie.title: District 9
movie.plot: Violence ensues after an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology.
movie.actors: Sharlto Copley, David James, Jason Cope

movie.title: Doom
movie.plot: Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines.
movie.actors: Karl Urban, Rosamund Pike, Dwayne Johnson

movie.title: Annihilation
movie.plot: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.
movie.actors: Natalie Portman, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Tessa Thompson

movie.title: Gravity
movie.plot: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.
movie.actors: Sandra Bullock, George Clooney, Ed Harris

movie.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movie.plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
movie.actors: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom

movie.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movie.plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
movie.actors: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen

movie.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movie.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
movie.actors: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen

movie.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
movie.plot: A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.
movie.actors: Martin Freeman, Ian McKellen, Richard Armitage

movie.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
movie.plot: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.
movie.actors: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage

movie.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
movie.plot: Bilbo and company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.
movie.actors: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage

movie.title: Forrest Gump
movie.plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweeth
movie.actors: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise

movie.title: Inception
movie.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.
movie.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page

movie.title: The Matrix
movie.plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
movie.actors: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

movie.title: The Matrix Reloaded
movie.plot: Freedom fighters Neo, Trinity and Morpheus continue to lead the revolt against the Machine Army, unleashing their arsenal of extraordinary skills and weaponry against the systematic forces of repression and exploitation.
movie.actors: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

movie.title: The Matrix Revolutions
movie.plot: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.
movie.actors: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

movie.title: The Matrix Resurrections
movie.plot: Return to a world of two realities: one, everyday life; the other, what lies behind it. To find out if his reality is a construct, to truly know himself, Mr. Anderson will have to choose to follow the white rabbit once more.
movie.actors: Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II

movie.title: Saving Private Ryan
movie.plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
movie.actors: Tom Hanks, Matt Damon, Tom Sizemore

movie.title: Interstellar
movie.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
movie.actors: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain

movie.title: The Green Mile
movie.plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
movie.actors: Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse

movie.title: Parasite
movie.plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
movie.actors: Kang-ho Song, Sun-kyun Lee, Yeo-jeong Cho

movie.title: The Pianist
movie.plot: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.
movie.actors: Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann, Frank Finlay

movie.title: Gladiator
movie.plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
movie.actors: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen

movie.title: The Prestige
movie.plot: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.
movie.actors: Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman, Scarlett Johansson

movie.title: Django Unchained
movie.plot: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.
movie.actors: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio

movie.title: WALL·E
movie.plot: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.
movie.actors: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin

movie.title: Inglourious Basterds
movie.plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.
movie.actors: Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger, Eli Roth

movie.title: Equilibrium
movie.plot: In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.
movie.actors: Christian Bale, Sean Bean, Emily Watson

movie.title: Joker
movie.plot: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.
movie.actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz

movie.title: The Hunt
movie.plot: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent littl
movie.actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen, Annika Wedderkopp

movie.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
movie.plot: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.
movie.actors: Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Tom Wilkinson

movie.title: Up
movie.plot: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.
movie.actors: Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger

movie.title: Green Book
movie.plot: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.
movie.actors: Viggo Mortensen, Mahershala Ali, Linda Cardellini

movie.title: A Beautiful Mind
movie.plot: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.
movie.actors: Russell Crowe, Ed Harris, Jennifer Connelly

movie.title: Shutter Island
movie.plot: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.
movie.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Emily Mortimer, Mark Ruffalo

movie.title: The Thing
movie.plot: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.
movie.actors: Kurt Russell, Wilford Brimley, Keith David

movie.title: The Thing
movie.plot: At an Antarctica research site, the discovery of an alien craft leads to a confrontation between graduate student Kate Lloyd and scientist Dr. Sander Halvorson.
movie.actors: Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Joel Edgerton, Ulrich Thomsen

movie.title: Hannibal
movie.plot: Living in exile, Dr. Hannibal Lecter tries to reconnect with now disgraced F.B.I. Agent Clarice Starling, and finds himself a target for revenge from a powerful victim.
movie.actors: Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman

movie.title: Hannibal
movie.plot: Explores the early relationship between renowned psychiatrist Hannibal Lecter and a young FBI criminal profiler who is haunted by his ability to empathize with serial killers.
movie.actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas

movie.title: The Truman Show
movie.plot: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.
movie.actors: Jim Carrey, Ed Harris, Laura Linney

movie.title: Blade Runner
movie.plot: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.
movie.actors: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young

movie.title: Inside Out
movie.plot: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.
movie.actors: Amy Poehler, Bill Hader, Lewis Black

movie.title: Finding Nemo
movie.plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
movie.actors: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould

movie.title: Stalker
movie.plot: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.
movie.actors: Alisa Freyndlikh, Aleksandr Kaydanovskiy, Anatoliy Solonitsyn

movie.title: Room
movie.plot: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.
movie.actors: Brie Larson, Jacob Tremblay, Sean Bridgers

movie.title: Dune
movie.plot: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.
movie.actors: Timothée Chalamet, Rebecca Ferguson, Zendaya

movie.title: Ford v Ferrari
movie.plot: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.
movie.actors: Matt Damon, Christian Bale, Jon Bernthal

movie.title: Logan
movie.plot: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.
movie.actors: Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen

movie.title: Run
movie.plot: A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her.
movie.actors: Sarah Paulson, Kiera Allen, Sara Sohn

movie.title: Rush
movie.plot: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.
movie.actors: Daniel Brühl, Chris Hemsworth, Olivia Wilde

movie.title: Monsters, Inc.
movie.plot: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.
movie.actors: Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Mary Gibbs

movie.title: Monsters University
movie.plot: A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski (Billy Crystal) and James P. "Sully" Sullivan (John Goodman) during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.
movie.actors: Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Steve Buscemi

movie.title: Oblivion
movie.plot: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.
movie.actors: Tom Cruise, Morgan Freeman, Andrea Riseborough

movie.title: The Room
movie.plot: Matt and Kate buy an isolated house. While moving, they discover a strange room that grants them an unlimited number of material wishes. But, since Kate has had two miscarriages, what they miss the most is a child.
movie.actors: Olga Kurylenko, Kevin Janssens, Joshua Wilson

movie.title: The Dark Knight
movie.plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
movie.actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

movie.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movie.plot: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.
movie.actors: Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway

movie.title: Batman Begins
movie.plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.
movie.actors: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Ken Watanabe

movie.title: Passengers
movie.plot: A malfunction in a sleeping pod on a spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet wakes one passenger 90 years early.
movie.actors: Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt, Michael Sheen

movie.title: The Departed
movie.plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
movie.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson

movie.title: Chappie
movie.plot: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.
movie.actors: Sharlto Copley, Dev Patel, Hugh Jackman

movie.title: Elysium
movie.plot: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.
movie.actors: Matt Damon, Jodie Foster, Sharlto Copley

movie.title: Vikings
movie.plot: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore - and raid - the distant shores across the ocean.
movie.actors: Katheryn Winnick, Gustaf Skarsgård, Alexander Ludwig

movie.title: Game of Thrones
movie.plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.
movie.actors: Emilia Clarke, Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington

movie.title: Another Round
movie.plot: Four high school teachers consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives.
movie.actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen, Magnus Millang

movie.title: At Eternity's Gate
movie.plot: A look at the life of painter Vincent van Gogh during the time he lived in Arles and Auvers-sur-Oise, France.
movie.actors: Willem Dafoe, Rupert Friend, Oscar Isaac

movie.title: Valhalla Rising
movie.plot: Forced for some time to be a fighting slave, a pagan warrior escapes his captors with a boy and joins a group of Crusaders on their quest to the Holy Land.
movie.actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Maarten Stevenson, Alexander Morton

movie.title: Casino Royale
movie.plot: After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, secret agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.
movie.actors: Daniel Craig, Eva Green, Judi Dench

movie.plot: King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.
movie.actors: Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, David Wenham

movie.title: Age of Uprising: The Legend of Michael Kohlhaas
movie.plot: In the 16th century in the Cévennes, a horse dealer by the name of Michael Kohlhaas leads a happy family life. When a lord treats him unjustly, he raises an army and puts the country to fire and sword in order to have his rights rest
movie.actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Mélusine Mayance, Delphine Chuillot

movie.title: Arctic
movie.plot: A man stranded in the Arctic after a plane crash must decide whether to remain in the relative safety of his makeshift camp or to embark on a deadly trek through the unknown.
movie.actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Maria Thelma Smáradóttir, Tintrinai Thikhasuk
